thread.title: Julia & Barry - Greensborough
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Julia & Barry - Greensborough

author: Julia & Barry - Greensborough
title: Julia & Barry - Greensborough
text: Our agent, Jim Papadopoulos from Nelson Alexander - Greensborough was by far the most tentative, proactive, unassuming and responsive real estate agent we could have hoped for. Jim's personable nature was a blessing during those anxious days leading up to the auction. He was the voice of reason when we needed his guidance on home presentation and a selling strategy leading up to and during the campaign. His professional ability ensured a fantastic $50,000 result above the reserve on auction day. We would have no hesitation in recommending Jim to other vendors. He was a delight to work with.
